Dear Valued Driver Partner Since approximately 04:50pm (Singapore time)  we have encountered some system technical issues. All our user and driver interfaces are impacted at the moment  including the Driver App. We sincerely apologise for the service interruption and we are working to resolve this as soon as possible.We will communicate with you as soon as we have any further updates. Please also feel free to refer to our Instagram Page (https://www.instagram.com/lalamovesgdrivers/) or Facebook Group (https://www.facebook.com/groups/driverlalamovesg) for the latest updates.Thank you for your patience.Best regards Lalamove Singapore

Viamove is looking for freelance delivery agentüîÜ Singaporean or PRüîÜ Minimum 16 years oldüîÜ Work at your own convenienceüîÜ Distance base pricing up to $15 nett per orderüîÜ Timeslot represent duration for collection and deliveryüîÜ Price displayed on app is nett earningüîÜ Walkers  Riders  Drivers welcomeüîÜ No signing up feeüîÜ Weekly PayoutSign up now :https://www.viamove.co/partner/driver-registerAny questions please email tosupport@viamove.co
